seo_keywords: Dyson V6 runs for few seconds then stops

problems.title: Runs briefly then stops / Red Light
problems.description: The vacuum runs for a few seconds and cuts out, or the light flashes red.
solution_steps: If the light flashes red (more than 12 times), the battery is faulty.
If it flashes blue but dies fast, the battery holds no charge.

problems.title: Motor Pulsing (Surging)
problems.description: Engine revs up and down repeatedly.
solution_steps: Check the flap inside the dust bin inlet.
